description:
test: merge nilptr/* into one test

The 512 MB array causes load delays on some systems.
Now that we have recover, we can do all the tests in
one binary, so that the delay is incurred just once.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=0c2d48ce926d ***

test: merge nilptr/* into one test

The 512 MB array causes load delays on some systems.
Now that we have recover, we can do all the tests in
one binary, so that the delay is incurred just once.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5142044

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5142044/diff/4002/test/nilptr.go
File test/nilptr.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5142044/diff/4002/test/nilptr.go#newcode3
test/nilptr.go:3: package main
put a little comment at the top saying what this tests. our test suite lacks those, generally

subject: code review 5142044: test: merge nilptr/* into one test
